Name: Silver-haired Echo Trainer - I
Description: Why does Grandpa Jingzhu insist on capturing Echoes? Go meet up with Chixia and help Grandpa Jingzhu together.
QuestDesc: Why does Grandpa Jingzhu insist on capturing Echoes? Go meet up with Chixia and help Grandpa Jingzhu together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chixia is talking to someone. Come back when they’re done talking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Old Man
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh*...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, seriously, you’re not well... Let’s forget about capturing <ano=TD Frequencies>Echoes</ano> for now and head straight to the hospital, okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No way! If I don't capture an impressive Echo, I'll be too anxious to even think about eating or sleeping.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, come on! You shouldn't be out there chasing them at your age. Why do you have to get one?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, because the person I like wants one!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The person you like...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. You know, it's not usual for a man of my years to seek love, but I love her. She keeps rejecting me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She’s into impressive Echoes, so that’s my in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sadly, I only have a Hoartoise. Round face, round head. Far from impressive.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I could just get an Echo that meets her standards, maybe she’d let me have a chance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh... Grandpa Jingzhu, are you really sure about that? It sounds a bit strange. It's not every day you see a lady keen on Echoes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At least, it seems to be the only way to her heart.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Despite the odds, I’m resolved to attempt it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you’re not at your best. You really should take some good rest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who knows what might happen if you take another tumble down that hillside...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, sorry! I shouldn’t have said such things!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Little Patroller, you're still too young to understand what love means. Enduring physical pain is one thing, but the ache of unrequited love is something even great heroes can't overcome.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, I’ll capture an impressive Echo and seize my love.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, please reconsider, Grandpa Jingzhu! Echoes will always be there for you to capture. Once you recover, you can catch as many as you want!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once I recover... But kid, I grow tired of waiting. When will the opportunity arise again?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, Tacet Discords are most active recently, so it’s the best time to capture impressive Echoes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can’t let this chance slip away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, okay. How about this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’ll go catch Echoes for you and you’ll go to the hospital. Is that okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I don’t want to bother you with my own issue...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries. It’s no trouble at all! After all, it’s a Patroller’s duty to take care of the residents’ needs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it doesn’t sit right with me having you work overtime for my personal issues. If you’re going to help, you have to accept some compensation from my savings. It’s the least I can do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, no need to worry about paying me! Actually, I have a really skilled friend who could help. What if we hire {Male=him;Female=her} to help instead?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That’s fine for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excellent! Leave it to me! Grandpa Jingzhu, now please go to the hospital and tend to your injuries.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Finally convinced Grandpa Jingzhu to go to the hospital... It's getting late. {PlayerName} should be arriving here soon...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my, you scared me! When did you get here?

Options.PlotLineKey: At the start of your conversation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then what do you think?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great, you can make some extra money while helping Grandpa Jingzhu. Talk about killing two birds with one stone, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Honestly, I'm super curious too. Something just doesn't add up with an old lady being so into Echoes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And why is Grandpa Jingzhu being so stubborn...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe we'll get some answers once we've snagged those Echoes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alrighty then, let’s get prepped and roll out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We’re almost there. Stick close to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, are you feeling alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m feeling perfectly good. Instead of worrying me, let’s focus on these <ano=Energy entities with chaotic frequencies>Tacet Discords</ano>.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’re right. There’s a whole bunch of Tacet Discords around. Which one do you think we should capture first?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly, that’s my goal. Let’s aim to capture the most impressive of them all!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The formidable ones are always the most impressive. It’s one and the same.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, let me think... the most formidable and impressive one around here is... Havoc Warrior! Let's capture it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Havoc Warrior is the monster with those big scythes, right? It’s indeed impressive! Grandpa Jingzhu, I had no idea you were so knowledgeable about Tacet Discords!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! Back in my prime, with my captain, we captured all kinds of Tacet Discords...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? There are several Havoc Warriors ahead. Let’s go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, knew we could pull it off! We’ve got an Echo now, easy peasy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey {PlayerName}, hurry and absorb it before it poofs away!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, there is indeed a Tacet Field! Grandpa Jingzhu, you really know a lot!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, I already told you, this old man had his fair share of adventures in his prime!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, it’s your moment to shine. Clear this Tacet Field and you should be able to capture some Echoes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whew, finally done! Let me see...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, two more Echoes to go! {PlayerName}, you’re so lucky!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know, the chances for Echoes to appear after taking down Tacet Discords are slim, not to mention bagging two at once!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They say the stronger your Terminal, the likelier it is for Echoes to pop up. That's because... because... Anyway, your Terminal must be crazy powerful! Right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well done, well done indeed. This Echo team is much more impressive than mine back in the day, haha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, I can feel the confidence swelling within me! Let’s return to Jinzhou and dazzle her!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, I can already picture the look on her face!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No rush. I also need to make some preparations. What should I say to her…

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her house is over there. I've walked that path many times and I won't make a mistake.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before I go knocking on her door, there's a favor I must ask of you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, I’ve prepared some opening lines and I need your assistance in delivering them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, just some nice words, carefully chosen, and I believe they’ll definitely do the trick.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you know what’s sweeter than any bloom? Not the Waterlamp’s glow, nor the Iris’s perfume, but the blossom of our love’s perfect tune!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you know what lasts forever in Wuthering Waves? Not fleeting civilizations, nor Tacet Discords’ lore, but my unwavering love for you, forevermore!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well... Grandpa Jingzhu, what are these?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Popular Love Messages in Huanglong! Ahem, I know it might seem a bit strange for someone of my age to say such things...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But as long as I can win her heart, I can put aside my pride.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m counting on you. After I say my line, you’ll follow up to set the perfect mood.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I had no idea you’re even more helpful than me! Way to go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, I won’t stint on compensation. Your efforts will be duly rewarded.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That’s settled then. Thank you, kids.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look! Aren’t these Echoes impressive? These two youngsters assisted me in capturing them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Linghan, we’re of similar age, with shared interests. I hold you dear and desire nothing more than to journey through life with you. Would you do me the honor of accepting this Noctemint?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of Echoes, that’s my specialty.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you’re aiming to become an Echo Master, you can’t judge an Echo solely from its appearance. Take this Carapace, for instance. Despite its imposing scythes, it may not be what it seems.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What truly counts is finding the Echo that resonates with you and nurturing it wisely. Always remember, never let appearances sway your decisions!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, yes. So, might you consider accepting this Noctemint?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, thank you. I’m not interested. I’d rather bask in the sunshine and enjoy some dried melon seeds all by myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, you’re already done with treatment? That was quick!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don’t let this old man’s age fool you. I’m still strong and these injuries hardly slow me down!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? Um... though it does seem like you’re totally fine now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! I’m used to injuries. Anyway, I’m feeling perfectly fine now. Shall we go?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you coming with us, Grandpa Jingzhu?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, how could I let you youngsters handle my affairs while I sit around? It’s dangerous outside Jinzhou and I’m familiar with the situation there. I’m sure I can be of some help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, don’t worry! This old man used to be quite something in his day! Even though I’m old now, I can still hold my own against any danger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, Grandpa Jingzhu, promise me you’ll take care of yourself. If anything dangerous pops up, don’t try to tough it out. Just give me a holler right away!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, it’s part of my Patroller duties.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, are you ready?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries. Take your time to sharpen your weapons.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Awesome, let’s do this! Grandpa Jingzhu said it’s the best time for Echo-catching, and I’m ready to snag a bunch!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There she is, Linghan, m-my beloved wife... wife-to-be.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s the Noctemint, her favorite flower.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m about to ask her, "Would you accept this Noctemint and join me on a lifelong journey?"

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But alas, my efforts seem to fall short... I truly hope she’ll appreciate this Noctemint this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps, with my carefully prepared opening lines and the majestic Echoes you’ve captured, she’ll finally accept my love.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you remember the opening lines? I’ll say my line first, and you’ll follow up! Remember to set the mood!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, there’s no time to waste. I must make my move!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, {PlayerName}, your passion is contagious! You’ve got me all fired up too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you know what’s sweeter than any bloom?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not the Waterlamp’s glow!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the blossom of our love’s perfect tune!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good! Better strike while the iron’s hot!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you know what lasts forever in Wuthering Waves?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not fleeting civilizations!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But my unwavering love for you, forevermore!

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You done? Please excuse me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait! I have a surprise for you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hurry! Show her those majestic Echoes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandma Linghan turned him down, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She didn’t accept my Noctemint...

Options.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu must be very upset.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, that's a bit of a bummer. I'm feeling a little down about it too...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, Grandpa Jingzhu, how about we shake off the blues with a stroll? Or maybe grab a bite to eat? I know a place that serves great Maocai, spicy but delicious!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m not disheartened, not in the slightest!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’ve been reflecting on Linghan’s words, and it’s become clear to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She wasn’t rejecting me. She was urging me to nurture the Echoes with care.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s her way of guiding me forward. Hahaha, she truly does care about me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Starting to wonder if Grandpa Jingzhu bumped his head.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come along, my young friends! There's no time to waste. We're leaving the city to gather the materials needed...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, Grandpa Jingzhu! Take it easy! It's getting late, and you're still recovering from your injury. Plus, {PlayerName} must be beat after capturing all those Echoes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, my apologies. I got carried away and lost track of time. You must be exhausted. Let’s do it another day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, almost forgot. Here’s your compensation. Please, accept it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good! Next time I ask for your help, I’ll also pay you a decent sum. It’s how connections are forged, isn’t it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take it, kid. You’ve earned it. Next time I ask for your help, I’ll also pay you a decent sum. It’s how connections are forged, isn’t it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’ve both worked hard today. Hurry home and rest up! Thank you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, are these Echoes enough?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Absolutely! See? The Echoes obtained in this Tacet Field can make up a team with Havoc Warrior.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Let me take a look. You're right!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, luck is on your side, huh? Putting together a team so quickly. Usually, it takes us quite a bit of effort to form an Echo team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oops, my bad! I got carried away and forgot to explain what that’s all about.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Give me a sec. I’m searching for the right words here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you already know, each Echo has its own unique frequency. When we gather several Echoes together, it's like...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's like having a bunch of people playing different instruments. Most of the time, the melodies clash and it's a total mess.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But there are times when melodies blend together perfectly, creating a beautiful harmony!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Forming an Echo team is just like that!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hope that made sense... Anyway, why not give it a shot yourself? It's the quickest way to understand!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Check it out, Grandpa Jingzhu! These massive scythes are just too cool, huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mm, not bad. She should be pleased this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hope, just this once, she’ll stay long enough to hear me out before walking straight away...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ooh, I’ve got an idea! What if we transformed into the Scythes? That’d definitely impress her!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, please don’t, dear. She might be scared. Perhaps we should gather a few more, just to be sure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Havoc Warrior is undoubtedly impressive, but relying on a single Echo might not be enough to capture her heart...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We need a collection, a display of multiple Echoes to truly leave an impression!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yep! Having a bunch of Echoes following behind turns head, but how can we snag more?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To <ano=A place where TDs gather>Tacet Field</ano>! Tacet Discords are drawn to those grounds like moths to a flame.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shh... I think I sense it. The frequencies of the Tacet Field...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There’s a Tacet Field nearby!
